meanings.definition: A station that broadcasts over a wide area, especially one that is received in distant locations.
meanings.sent1: The superstations on the radio can be heard in many different cities.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy listening to superstations that play a variety of music.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the superstations have a secret code hidden in their broadcasts.
meanings.sent4: The superstations are like giant speakers spreading music across the land.
meanings.sent5: The superstations light up the airwaves with their powerful signals.

meanings.definition: An excessive or irrational belief in the power of certain actions or objects.
meanings.sent1: His superstations about lucky socks always make me smile.
meanings.sent2: She had a superstations that wearing a specific necklace brought good luck.
meanings.sent3: My friend's superstations about his favorite pen are quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The superstations people have about four-leaf clovers are fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The superstations surrounding black cats are deeply ingrained in some cultures.
